column5: WOW! Excellant report. Its god to see some salt water reports!That grouper looks like a monster smallie!
www.getawaygulffishing.com
Beauty report Bubba. Even a few new (to me) fish in there. Looks like you had a wonderful time.
Thanks for the change of pace report.  Really nice fishing.  Dawg, your hospitality is showing.
Man how much fun does that look! Too think I turned the furnace on this week. Great report...nice Redfish man!
Nice reoprt there Glen, some good looking fish! That meal looks delicious too!
Great report Glen! You certainly made my day so far! Ruth and Don are excellent company to spend some time fishing with I'm sure. Is that Brian from Tennessee in there?
great report and fish.Looks like a blast

WOW...thats an amazing fishing trip & report !!!!!!!   WTG glen,that must have been a great fishing trip to meet up with your freinds and going deep-sea fishing...man there sure is a big variety and sizes of those fish....i spose it takes a while to learn all the speices,and which ones are good to eat and what ones are not...great pics of all the fish,and of your trip & the fish on the   BBQ...yyyyuuummmmyyyyyyyy!!!!!!!!!   thanks for sharing glen,you sure have better weather down there to go fishing than we have up here in ontario......enjoy the rest of your fishing /trip & holiday....cheers
Great report G!

Attaboy,  Glen.  I didn't care what anyone else said, I KNEW you could catch some fish on this trip.  Congrats on fishing with Deg and Ruth, and BCanuck too.  All fine folks who, it would appear, will fish with anyone!
You crack me up G.  Only you would think something like that.  What  great report, well worth the wait.  Looks like you all had an awesome time.  Nice to see BCanuck again too.  Joey
Nice report Dawg and a great crew of people to fish with. Next time keep the shark it some really good eattin.   Art

Well thats the report I was waiting for GCD and you have been such a teaze lately with pics here and there.After all those huge fish I think you will find Bay of Quinte Walleye small and boring.Now about that secret weapon for Quinte I expect a PM from ya a captain has to know what kind of bait is aboard his vessel  .  Glenn that was one Helluva a report love the size of those fish.The food pics are mouth watering.  Awesome report  MTP
I thoroughly enjoyed your report....great pics too...you are one funny guy.
Great pictures and report Glenn!
great report
Well Well Dawg you have me wanting to plan my next trip down south with you next year ( Right after Lakair) LoL Great report and Congrats on the Grouper Great pics too!!!

WOO HOO!!! What a great report Glen.  We would have posted this yesterday, but for some reason our home puter wont load OFC.  Bly wants me to email your report and pics home so she can read it.  Looked like a great time with great friends and great fishing!

Glen, its been years but we used to go to the redneck riveria , as a foamily we used to go over Easter and camp right on the dunes, used to catch Pompano right off the beach, and back then we would come back from the charter with a ton of snapper, Id show you some pictures, but I dont have my shirt on.

Wow great report!  My mother lived down there in Pass Christian Mississippi until hurrican Katrina destroyed it and everything she had.  I remeber always looking forward to my anual trips down there.  I always love to fish there from the shore and out at the rigs.  Lots of redfish, little tunnie and many many other types of fish, always a good fight when you get a shark on.  I really miss it there.  We were last there this past winter and it looks like people are starting to get things going again but still alot of cleanup to do, many things still left the way they were when the Hurricane hit.  Thanks for the report hope there are more, brings back memories!  Don
Nice report Green, looks like fun, lots of nice fish.
Great report Glenn, well worth the wait  Maureen
Super duper report and pic,s there. Thats also a huge smallie in the 10th pic.WOW
Great report dawg and even better company. Good too see Brian out having fun!  Thanks for sharing
Nice trip there Bubba.Good to see Brian and Dons mug out there in the beautiful Gulf.Them other coonasses looked a bit shady! Joe
